aarakshaka lekam shantha kottegoda ha widesha lekam rawinatha aaryasinhage sama sabhapathithwayen aarakshaka amathyanshaye di pawathi sanwadayaka di, mema praharayen anathuruwa aarakshaka hamudawa wisin ganna lada kriyamarga ha idiriye di ganu labana piyawara pilibandawa purna karunu idiripath kirimakin anathuruwa, thrasthawadaya ha prachandakari anthawadaya mandapawathwima sandaha “samastha rajayama” anthargatha praweshayaka athi awashyathawa pilibandawa awadharanaya karanu labini.
